captions.text: A shadow falls on your face
It shows, you can't hide
Don't deny, I can see you crying
Stop running away and tell me
Tears on your pretty hands
Your smudged make-up makes me mad
It's him, isn't it? Just tell me
Tell me and I'll take care of it
You're like a piece of glass
I'm so nervous I can't take my eyes off of you
I've been waiting so long, why do you like him?
I want to take you into my arms
and protect you
I'll pull you out drowning in your own tears
Why do you live like that?
Let me look at you, let me know you
I can't leave you alone
You're a hard girl
You're an amazing girl
You make me nervous
You deserve better than him
Why do you take him back after being fooled again?
He doesn't know what you're worth
The value of the masterpiece you are
Listen to me, it's not love
Stop lying to yourself and look
So stupid, so obsessive, why try so hard?
What happened to you, letting him treat you this way?
I've been waiting so long, why do you like him?
I want to take you into my arms
and protect you
I'll pull you out drowning in your own tears
Why do you live like that?
Let me look at you, let me know you
I can't leave you alone
To be honest? You're too good for him
You deserve better
So don't ache over him
I have to watch you destroy yourself
and it'll break my heart
I'll be where you need me to be
You don't have to be in pain anymore
I'm always here for you
It's time you got your own boyfriend
Let me get you out of there
Even if it's hell you're in
This is all because I love you a lot
Why don't you see?
I'm so frustrated by your foolish love
Just look back at yourself
I want you to be loved a lot more
You're all I know
Let me look at you, let me know you
I can't ignore you
You're a hard girl
You're an amazing girl
You make me nervous
But still you
It's still you
I love you
Obsession

comments.text:
Youngmin is the older twin by 6 minutes - he's a singer who unfortunately 
doesn't get that many lines although he has a solo called "Time" if you 
want to hear his voice. Kwangmin is the younger twin - he raps and has a 
duet with Minwoo (the other rapper) called "Don't Stop". Hope this helps! :D

comments.text:
Judging by how many times i've seen this the guy in the green is actually 
Peter who kidnapped Wendy from Cap'n Hook who is played by Donghyun, 
Donghyun and the rest of the crew go on a hunt for her after realizing the 
true plan Peter has for Wendy and just as they are about to rescue her 
Peter forces the bomb in her hands, pushes her and kills her as the bomb 
goes off. Donghyun 'lost' his hand during the explosion so he gains the 
hook at the end.

comments.author: injung im

comments.text:
The concept of this video is a little tricky. In the video,Peter Pan is the 
bad guy (the man in the green suit) and Boyfriend are the "evil guys" - 
that's why Donghyun has a hook in his hand at the end. There trying to 
rescue Wendy (the girl you see at the start) from Peter Pan who is the 
villain. In the end,the girl gets blown up :D If you're still confused - 
type in on YouTube : "Boyfriend Obsession Behind The Scenes". Hope this 
helps!
